intro: Psychotria soteropolitana, commonly known as the Soteropolis Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the Caribbean, specifically found in the island of Hispaniola. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and clusters of small, white to pale green flowers. It thrives in humid, shaded environments, typically in tropical rainforests. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a rare and endangered species.
